data.title: iSEDfit: Bayesian spectral energy distribution modeling of galaxies
data.name: iSEDfit
data.description: iSEDfit is a Bayesian spectral energy distribution fitting code designed to extract the physical properties of galaxies from broadband photometry.

evidence: "iSEDfit is a Bayesian spectral energy distribution fitting code designed to extract the physical properties of galaxies from broadband photometry."
"The full suite of routines are publicly distributed as part of my impro IDL library."
Citation block describing it as research software for Bayesian spectral energy distribution modeling of galaxies, implying direct use in scientific analysis.
